author: Christopher
text: The order never even shipped.
title: The order never even shipped.

author: Albert Brown
text:
Good luck contacting customer service when an item is delayed. 
First, when you place the order, they automatically take the money and say "the seller has 2 business days to send us the item". If that doesn't happen, there is no timeframe for you to expect the item or customer service to address your concerns.
title: Good luck contacting customer service…

author: MG
text: It took to long to get the Nikes
title: It took to long to get the Nikes

author: Jaasmin
text: Both shoes I got apparently run small and I can’t return them, so I’m stuck with them. This sucks!
title: Both shoes I got apparently run small…

author: Shloomy
text: There was a stain on my shoe when I got it and there were marks on some parts of the shoe and they wouldn’t assist me on the issue.
title: There was a stain on my shoe when I got…

author: Emily Bancroft
text: I received and paid for 2 pairs of shoes. And there's no way I can make a call to get a refund. No receipt or number that is answered.
title: I received and paid for 2 pairs of…

author: Amachala
text: Ordered shoes. Waited about a week just to have them cancelled without warning. No reason given.
title: Ordered shoes

author: Grindin
text: Been two weeks still haven’t gotten my package or no new updates
title: Been two weeks still haven’t gotten my…

author: Jacob
text: Customer service sucks!
title: Customer service sucks!

author: Roy
text: There was only a picture of one shoe, and the shoes that came with two different colors! Ridiculous. Nobody said anything, even after they were verified by StockX.
title: There was only a picture of one shoe

author: John
text: Awful customer service
title: Awful customer service

author: Rachel
text: StockX received the shoes I ordered two weeks ago and have now said there is a delay in authentication. I don’t know for how long. They have had my money since April 17th. The turn around is way to slow.
title: StockX received the shoes I ordered two…

author: Robbie
text: Took a long time to get some cheaper shoes but still recommended
title: Long wait but worth it

author: StockxCustomer
text: Ordered my shoes two weeks ago and they haven’t even arrived to StockX yet. I’m very disappointed.
title: Ordered my shoes two weeks ago and they…

author: Tyrell
text: Took longer then they said
title: Took longer then they said

author: Juan
text: Still waiting on my shoes I ordered, going on 4 weeks.
title: Still waiting on my shoes I ordered

author: Samiat
text: Waste of time
title: Zero sense of urgency

author: Cornelius
text: Tracking wasn’t the greatest or a status update
title: Tracking wasn’t the greatest or an update

author: Ariane Grant
text: I bought sneakers from Stock x and it looked like someone with an extra fat foot tried on the shoe. It was crinkled at the toe and out of shape. Stock x is giving me hell about returning the shoe. I will never buy from them again. My first and last time. Do not buy from here
title: I bought sneakers from Stock x and it…

author: Kidd
text:
One of my oders has been placed two weeks, the website says that it is ready for pick up and I have been waiting for two weeks. Nothing updated, and no way I can contant anyone.
The other ohder has been placed for a week You said that we are waiting for seller to ship and the seller has 2 business days, but I have been waitting a week. Again, nothing updated and no one tells me what is happenning.
I am going to change the address in 3 weeks and I have no way to edit the shipping address and no one from Stockx is able to help me solve it. Your customer service  is terrible and fallacious!
title: Poor customer service
